cvl/cvl_blend.h File Reference

Alpha blending. More...


Functions

void cvl_frame_blend (cvl_frame_t *frame, int dst_x, int dst_y, const cvl_frame_t *block, const cvl_frame_t *block_alpha)

Detailed Description

Merge pixel blocks with support for transparency.

Function Documentation

void cvl_frame_blend (  cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  dst_x,
int  dst_y,
const cvl_frame_t *  block,
const cvl_frame_t *  block_alpha
) 
 

Parameters:
frame The frame.
dst_x The x coordinate of the block's destination in the frame.
dst_y The y coordinate of the block's destination in the frame.
block The block to be copied into the frame.
block_alpha The alpha map for the block.
Copies block into frame at the position specified by dst_x and dst_y. The transparency of the block is read from block_alpha, which must be of pixel type CVL_PIXEL_GRAY. The block and the frame must have the same pixel type. The block must fit in the frame.
